effect.gold_silver: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
effect.crystal: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.

short_effect.gold_silver: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect.crystal: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.gold_silver: An attack that may freeze the foe.
flavor_text.crystal: An attack that may freeze the foe.
